verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>. As <S%H5492>whirlwinds<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H2498>pass<s%> through; so it <S%H935>cometh<s%> from the <S%H4057>desert<s%>, from a <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>.

A <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> is <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto me; the treacherous <S%H898>dealer<s%> dealeth <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> <S%H7703>spoileth<s%>. Go <S%H5927>up<s%>, O <S%H5867>Elam<s%>: <S%H6696>besiege<s%>, O <S%H4074>Media<s%>; all the <S%H585>sighing<s%> thereof have I made to <S%H7673>cease<s%>. grievous: Heb. hard

Therefore are my <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2479>pain<s%>: <S%H6735>pangs<s%> have taken <S%H270>hold<s%> upon me, as the <S%H6735>pangs<s%> of a woman that <S%H3205>travaileth<s%>: I was bowed <S%H5753>down<s%> at the <S%H8085>hearing<s%> of it; I was <S%H926>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H7200>seeing<s%> of it.

My <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H8582>panted<s%>, <S%H6427>fearfulness<s%> <S%H1204>affrighted<s%> me: the <S%H5399>night<s%> of my <S%H2837>pleasure<s%> hath he <S%H7760>turned<s%> into <S%H2731>fear<s%> unto me. heart: or, mind wandered turned: Heb. put

<S%H6186>Prepare<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>, <S%H6822>watch<s%> in the <S%H6844>watchtower<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%>, <S%H8354>drink<s%>: <S%H6965>arise<s%>, ye <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%>.
For thus hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman<s%>, let him <S%H5046>declare<s%> what he <S%H7200>seeth<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%>; and he <S%H7181>hearkened<s%> <S%H7182>diligently<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7182>heed<s%>:

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%>, A <S%H738>lion<s%>: My <S%H136>lord<s%>, I <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> upon the <S%H4707>watchtower<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%>, and I am <S%H5324>set<s%> in my <S%H4931>ward<s%> whole <S%H3915>nights<s%>: he: or, cried as a lion whole: or, every night

And, behold, here <S%H935>cometh<s%> a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>, with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>. And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>; and all the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of her <S%H430>gods<s%> he hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> unto the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

O my <S%H4098>threshing<s%>, and the <S%H1121>corn<s%> of my <S%H1637>floor<s%>: that which I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, have I <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto you. corn: Heb. son

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1746>Dumah<s%>. He <S%H7121>calleth<s%> to me out of <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, <S%H8104>Watchman<s%>, what of the <S%H3915>night<s%>? <S%H8104>Watchman<s%>, what of the <S%H3915>night<s%>?

The <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%>, and also the <S%H3915>night<s%>: if ye will <S%H1158>enquire<s%>, <S%H1158>enquire<s%> ye: <S%H7725>return<s%>, <S%H857>come<s%>.
The <S%H4853>burden<s%> upon <S%H6152>Arabia<s%>. In the <S%H3293>forest<s%> in <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> shall ye <S%H3885>lodge<s%>, O ye travelling <S%H736>companies<s%> of <S%H1720>Dedanim<s%>.

The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H857>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7125>him<s%> that was <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, they <S%H6923>prevented<s%> with their <S%H3899>bread<s%> him that <S%H5074>fled<s%>. brought: or, bring ye

For they <S%H5074>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>swords<s%>, <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H5203>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H3514>grievousness<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>. from the swords: or, for fear, etc: Heb. from the face, etc

For thus hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Within a <S%H8141>year<s%>, according to the <S%H8141>years<s%> of an <S%H7916>hireling<s%>, and all the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>:

And the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7198>archers<s%>, the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, shall be <S%H4591>diminished<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it. archers: Heb. bows
